project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches current weather information for a specified city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project structure and initialize the Python environment
Implement functionality to fetch weather data from a public API
Parse the retrieved weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and conditions
Display the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
